trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_000<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Uplander desires knowings of Rival Wings? Softknox makes uplander's braincase wet from many tongueflaps!
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_Q1_000_001<tab>What do you wish to know about Rival Wings?
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A1_000_002<tab>What is Rival Wings?
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A1_000_003<tab>What are the rules?
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A1_000_004<tab>What are the rewards?
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A1_000_005<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_Q2_000_001<tab>Which rules will you ask about?
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_000_002<tab>Cores.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_000_003<tab>Towers.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_000_004<tab>Power generator.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_000_005<tab>Machina.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_000_006<tab>Ceruleum.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_000_007<tab>Mammets.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_100_007<tab>Soaring.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_A2_000_008<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_010<tab>Uplanders fight each other with mighty machina of gobmake. Make much mayhem and turn core of enemy into bitty-bits!
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>Rival Wings is a large-scale PvP battle involving up to 48 combatants. Participants are divided into two teams, the Falcons and the Ravens.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>Each team is given a core to protect, and the side that destroys the opponent's core is declared the winner.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>Should time run out before a core is destroyed, victory is awarded to the team that dealt the most damage to the core and its protective towers.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_050<tab>Core is thumping heart of battle. A winner is team that makes core of enemy become bitty-bits.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>Each team has a core located at its base, and the chief objective is to destroy the enemy's core.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>The core is protected by a magitek field emanating from two towers.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>As such, before you can strike at the core, you must first destroy the towers and deactivate the magitek field.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_070<tab>Towers keep core awayharm. If towers upstand, uplander cannot strikesmash core. Uplanders must downbring towers first!
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>Each team has two towers that serve to protect the core.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_076<tab>Each tower, meanwhile, is enveloped in a magitek field that mitigates damage taken by team members.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_077<tab>When hard-pressed, your towers can provide you with much-needed respite. Be sure to take advantage of their protection.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_090<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Uplander who takeholds power generator takeholds ceruleum! Ceruleum lifeblood of planstrike!
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_095<tab>A power generator is located at the center of the map. Combatants can take control of the generator by interacting with it.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_096<tab>While the generator is under a team's control, the stores of ceruleum for all of its alliances will gradually replenish.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_097<tab>As more ceruleum means more opportunities to deploy machina, the power generator's strategic value cannot be overstated.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_110<tab>Gobbies crafty-make special machina for Rival Wings. Machina to help uplanders crunch much bone and smash much steel!
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_115<tab>Powerful machina can be deployed and ridden into battle.

TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_116<tab>There exist three types: the Cruise Chaser, effective against combatants; the Oppressor, devastating against structures; and Brute Justice, the great equalizer.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_117<tab>While machina offer many advantages, ceruleum is required to activate them.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_118<tab>Once your team has sufficient ceruleum, you can choose a machina to deploy at the hangar terminal, located near the starting area.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_119<tab>Only one machina may be operated per party at any given time, regardless of type.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>In the case of the Oppressor, however, the limit is two per team.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>A Brute Justice becomes available to a team for each tower it loses.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_122<tab>You can simultaneously operate as many Brute Justices as the number of towers you have lost.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_130<tab>Machina are mighty and can smite muchly, yes, but they need fuel. Uplander must be collecting ceruleum first.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>Ceruleum is required to operate machina. A maximum of 100 units of ceruleum can be stored by each party.

TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_136<tab>You can build up your ceruleum stores by collecting tanks in the field, controlling the power generator, or defeating enemy team members and mammets.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_137<tab>As ceruleum is a party resource, it is recommended that you confer with your comrades prior to activating a machina.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_150<tab>Trusty mammets fight for each team. March on tower and core, and kaboom! Massive damage!
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_155<tab>Mammets are clockwork soldiers programmed to seek out and destroy towers and cores.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_156<tab>They emerge from their own core at regular intervals before striking out on a set route, and will remain in battle for a set duration.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_157<tab>Upon detecting an enemy mammet, they will engage and attack until either side is destroyed.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_158<tab>Mammets that arrive at an enemy tower or core will perform a powerful self-sacrificing attack.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_159<tab>That is the extent of their programming; mammets will not harm adventurers.

TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_160<tab>If uplander downstrikes enemy, spirit of comrades soars! <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Soaring<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> spirit makes for easier downstriking!

TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_165<tab>When you defeat an enemy team member, your party receives the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Soaring<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> effect.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_166<tab>The effect increases damage dealt as well as HP restored, and can stack up to twenty times.

TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_167<tab>At twenty stacks, Soaring will be replaced with the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Flying High<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> effect, which confers even greater benefits.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_168<tab>Soaring fluctuates by party, increasing when a party member defeats an enemy team member or destroys a tower.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SOFTKNOX_000_200<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Big questprize awaits winners, so fight well and strikesmash muchly!

TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>Participating in Rival Wings will earn you <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>experience points<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>PvP EXP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Wolf Marks<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, with a larger amount being awarded to the victors.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPMOCKBATTLEGUIDE_00441_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>You will also receive <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Allagan tomestones<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at the end of each match.
